TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FieldCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: References the method to call when retrieving field data from a provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When a Web Parts control provides data through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface, the consumer or transformer must retrieve and process the field data from the provider. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback> delegate represents the method to call for processing the provider data.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField.GetFieldValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.FieldCallback> delegate parameter.
